global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”27px|0px|17px|0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT : OBSERVE YOUR BRAIN RHYTHMS” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_line_height=”1.4em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

OBSERVE YOUR BRAIN RHYTHMS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||0px|” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”7px|0px|27px|0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT : This picture can be…” _builder_version=”4.19.0″ text_orientation=”justified” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]This picture represents a cube in three dimensions. Now focus on the center of the cube without moving your eyes and observe the perspective during a few minutes, without making any particular effort of will. What do you see? Is the same perspective constant or does it change? Actually, you have to see two alternating perspectives. And now count the number of seconds each perspective lasts. Is the time equal?[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT : Vertical alternation…” _builder_version=”4.19.0″ text_orientation=”justified” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]Vertical alternation: This flight of stairs has a peculiar characteristic. It can be perceived as being upside down. This symmetry shows that the brain analyses shapes beyond what we believe we see. This drawing can be perceived in a different way: in the shape of a ‟folding screen” seen from above and dividing a room in two. Whatever the shape of the drawing, some people see parts of it disappear and reappear regularly. All these phenomena show that the two hemispheres of the brain function in a rhythmic fashion. Attention, memory, and reflection depend on the regularity of brain alternation.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.phosphenism.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/cube.png” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”IMG: Cube” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”500px” always_center_on_mobile=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT: Necker’s Cube” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Necker’s Cube

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.phosphenism.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/escalier.png” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”IMG: Escalier” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”500px” always_center_on_mobile=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT: Twin Stairs” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Twin Stairs

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT : Is the alternation…” _builder_version=”4.19.0″ text_orientation=”justified” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]Is the alternation regular? If so, congratulations! The exchanges between your two hemispheres are regular, your attention is adequate.
If not, you probably have problems keeping your attention focused on a task and you get tired quickly.
Practicing Phosphenic Mixing exercises will restore your brain alternation and will improve your mental abilities.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px|||” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT: THE BRAIN FUNCTIONS IN A RHYTHMIC WAY” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

THE BRAIN FUNCTIONS IN A RHYTHMIC WAY

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#f7f7f7″ custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT: If you observe the cube…” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_orientation=”justified” custom_margin=”30px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]If you observe the cube, you will notice that, after a while, the perspective seems to change spontaneously, as if the cube moved. This phenomenon is usually qualified as an optical illusion, but it is actually a type of analysis that is specific of the brain. The fluctuation is due to the two brain hemispheres functioning in alternation, as demonstrated by Dr. Lefebure in his book ‟Exploring the Brain with the study of the Double Phosphenes Oscillations”.

These little observation tests underscore the rhythmic functions of the brain. If you didn’t see the cube changing position, or if the alternation was very slow or irregular, it could signal a cerebral imbalance.

Practicing phosphenic technics restores the balance of the hemispheres and leads to an improvement of intellectual capacities as a whole.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.phosphenism.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/couv_exploration.jpg” title_text=”couv_exploration” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”IMG: Eclairage alterné” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” always_center_on_mobile=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”63px|0px|21px|0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT: PHOSPHENISME, THE EFFECTS ARE NO LONGER TO BE PROVEN …” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]PHOSPHENISM, THE EFFECTS ARE NO LONGER
TO BE PROVEN, BUT TO DISCOVER[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT : When we associate…” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_orientation=”justified” global_colors_info=”{}”]When we associate the phosphenes with any traditional or modern exercises of individual development, we multiply their effects considerably. This way, we can obtain the development of memory, attention, intelligence, the sense of initiative and creativity; making Phosphenism a magnificent educational tool.

Phosphenes act as genuine accelerators of the mental processes. They allow us to have a direct action on our own thoughts, on their contents, their quality, their organization, thus optimizing the output of the thinking process or any other intellectual effort. Phosphenes are at the origin of all of Doctor Lefebure’s discoveries.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”23px|17px|27px|18px” border_radii=”on|0px|0px|0px|0px” border_width_all=”1px” box_shadow_style=”preset2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.phosphenism.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/coupe_dr-1.jpg” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”IMG: Coupe” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”125px” always_center_on_mobile=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT : Dr Lefebure’s main…” _builder_version=”4.19.0″ text_orientation=”justified” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Dr. Lefebure’s main discoveries have been verified by the C.N.R.S. (National Center of Scientific Research) at the P.T.T.’s Central Laboratory (Post Offices, Telegraphs and Phones) in the 1960’s.

Then, for his work, Dr. Lefebure received several gold and silver medals like THE PRIZE OF ‟LÉPINE” CONTEST (the most famous inventions contest in France).

See THE FOUNDER

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
